events.title: Coding Bootcamp 2024
events.description: Join us for a comprehensive coding bootcamp where you'll learn the latest technologies and programming languages.

events.title: Hackathon for IT Enthusiasts
events.description: Get ready to unleash your coding skills at our annual hackathon event. Bring your innovative ideas and collaborate with fellow IT enthusiasts.

events.title: Web Development Workshop
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of web development in this hands-on workshop. Build your first website and dive into HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
